csheets.core.formula.lang

Class If

  • java.lang.Object
    • csheets.core.formula.lang.If
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function

    public class If
extends Object
implements Function
    A function that emulates the if-then-else statement.
    Author:
    Einar Pehrson
